sentences.en: I've known all along what I need to know about Lori.
sentences.cn: 关于萝蕊,该知道的我一直就知道.

sentences.en: Lori is being nice because she wants a favour.
sentences.cn: 劳瑞待人很好,因为她想要别人帮忙.
但她从未对我说过什么特别的话.

sentences.en: Lori Trammel skanked her way through the entire football team!
sentences.cn: 罗莉·泰墨在橄榄球队混不下去了!

sentences.en: LORI: Don't tease me! Good food is really important to Chinese!
sentences.cn: 萝莉: 别取笑我了! 美食对中国人来说是很重要的.

sentences.en: Lori: Hello. I am very dissatisfied with my hotel room.
sentences.cn: 萝芮: 你好, 我对我的房间非常不满意.

sentences.en: LORI: I'm a great cook actually. You will see.
sentences.cn: 萝莉: 事实上我很会做菜, 你等着看好了.

sentences.en: LORI: No, dim sum is usually eaten around lunch time.
sentences.cn: 萝莉: 不是.点心通常是午餐吃的.

sentences.en: On the bus Lori sat next to me.
sentences.cn: 在公交车上,萝蕊坐在我身边.

sentences.en: Tammy and lori began to cry. Mark sat motionless.
sentences.cn: 泰米和洛瑞开始抽泣, 马克一动不动地坐着.

sentences.en: Tammy and Lori began to cry. Mark sat motionless.
sentences.cn: 塔米和劳瑞开始大哭, 马克呆呆地坐在那里,面无表情.

sentences.en: Tammy and Lori still had tears in their eyes.
sentences.cn: 泰米和洛瑞眼里仍含着泪.

sentences.en: Tammy and Lori still had tears in their eyes. Mark was still silent.
sentences.cn: 塔米和劳瑞眼中仍然满含热泪, 马克则静静的在那儿,一言不发.

sentences.en: There are a few dolphin studies out there, but they don't add up to much, says Lori Marino, a neuroscience and behavioral biology researcher at Emory University in Atlanta.
sentences.cn: 现在已有少数关于海豚的研究，但是总计并不多，亚特兰大埃默里大学的神经科学和行为生物学研究者--罗莉马里诺说道。

sentences.en: Were you at Lori Tinsley's house last night?
sentences.cn: 昨晚上你去罗瑞·坦斯雷家了 吗 ?

trans.tran_cn: [女子名] 洛丽 Loren的阴性
